meanings.definition: To spread over or cover a surface
meanings.sent1: The paint was overspreading the wall smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The fog was overspreading the entire valley.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the paint can, overspreading the floor with color.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident was overspreading the small town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The vines overspreading the garden fence created a beautiful green curtain.

meanings.definition: To extend over a large area
meanings.sent1: The lush forest was overspreading the mountainside.
meanings.sent2: The shadow of the tree was overspreading the grassy field.
meanings.sent3: The picnic blanket kept overspreading every time the wind blew.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of joy overspreading her heart was like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds overspreading the sky signaled an impending downpour.

meanings.sent1: The darkness was overspreading the room as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: The silence overspreading the library made it a peaceful place to study.
meanings.sent3: The icing on the cake kept overspreading, making it look like a snow-capped mountain.
meanings.sent4: The sense of calm overspreading her mind was like a soothing balm.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread overspreading the kitchen was irresistible.
